original_text: He said to them, “I see that your father’s attitude toward me is not what it was before, but the God of my father has been with me.
korean_text: 그들에게 이르되 내가 그대들의 아버지의 안색을 본즉 내게 대하여 전과 같지 아니하도다 그러할지라도 내 아버지의 하나님은 나와 함께 계셨느니라

sentences.original_text: I see that your father's attitude toward me
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신 아버지가 나에 대한 태도가

sentences.original_text: is not what it was before
but the God of my father
